title: Left Dissapointed
review: Very creepy film . started really well and continued to do so until the final 10 minutes.Sadly the ending was terrible. Even laughable. This film could have been very good.

title: Give me my 4 hours back!!!
review:
If you rate this over 5 then you are puddled.
Is the slowest most boring film ever seen. Nothing happens.
If it wasn't for the cast who are class, I would have rated it less.
Don't bother.

title: Heart still racing 2 hours after seeing film!
review:
Probably the most tense film I have ever seen. From start to finish you are on the edge of your seat. What a rollercoaster. Acting is fantastic and the drama is just intense. 
Great job John and Emily!

title: I need a spa day after that!
review:
Intense, brutal and heartbreaking!
Oscar in the bag 🏆
Enough said.
